subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Rick Hendrick’s run of good fortune on the track has always been accompanied by troubles or tragedy away from it, as when he was found to have leukemia in 1996.
snippet: Rick Hendrick’s run of good fortune on the track has always been accompanied by troubles or tragedy away from it, as when he was found to have leukemia in 1996.
